Dgame.Math.Matrix4x4



struct Matrix4x4;
A Matrix is a structure which may describe different transformation.

Note:
Matrix4x4.init is the identity Matrix.

Author:
Randy Schuett (rswhite4@googlemail.com)

pure nothrow @nogc this(float a, float b, float c, float d, float e, float f, float g, float h, float i);
CTor

const pure nothrow @nogc Matrix4x4 getInverse();
Returns the inverse Matrix of the current. If the current matrix has a determinant of approximately zero, the identity Matrix (.init) is returned.

pure nothrow @nogc ref Matrix4x4 loadIdentity();
Reset the current Matrix to the identity Matrix

const pure nothrow @nogc float det();
Calculate the determinant

pure nothrow @nogc ref Matrix4x4 translate()(auto ref const Vector2f vec);
Translate the Matrix

pure nothrow @nogc ref Matrix4x4 rotate(float angle);
Rotate the Matrix about angle (in degree!)

pure nothrow @nogc ref Matrix4x4 rotate()(float angle, auto ref const Vector2f center);
Rotate the Matrix about angle (in degree!) about the given center position

pure nothrow @nogc ref Matrix4x4 scale()(auto ref const Vector2f scale);
Scale the Matrix about factor scale

pure nothrow @nogc ref Matrix4x4 scale()(auto ref const Vector2f scale, auto ref const Vector2f center);
Scale the Matrix about factor scale about the given center position

pure nothrow @nogc void lookAt()(auto ref const Vector3f eye, auto ref const Vector3f look, auto ref const Vector3f up);
Calculates a View-Matrix

inout pure nothrow @nogc ref inout(float[16]) getValues();
Returns the 16 values of the Matrix by ref

inout pure nothrow @nogc ref inout(float) opIndex(ubyte index);
Returns a specific value by index

const pure nothrow @nogc Matrix4x4 opBinary(string op : "*")(ref const Matrix4x4 mat);
Supported operations: only *

pure nothrow @nogc ref Matrix4x4 opOpAssign(string op : "*")(ref const Matrix4x4 math);
Supported operations: only *=
